name: Hybrid Monsters
description:
[In Development]

It's a simple roguelite (similar to roguelike) made for #GithubGameOff

Hybrid Monster is a dungeon roguelite in which you enter more and more dangerous dungeons. Like all RPGs, you can level up, equip weapons and more.

In a parallel world, hybrid monsters fight day by day against humanoids. The life of hybrid monsters is difficult...

Here is an entertaining and simple roguelite in which you can fight against humanoids. Immerse yourself in this unforgettable adventure and help the hybrid monsters to fight against the humanoids.

Controls

WASD - Move

Enter/Space - Take Item

F - Inventory

G - Attributes

H - Shop

Requirements

OpenGL ES 3.0 compatible hardware
